org.jfree.chart
Class NestedGrid

java.lang.Object
  org.jfree.chart.block.AbstractContentBlock
      org.jfree.chart.NestedGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Block, ContentBlock, org.jfree.ui.Drawable
public class NestedGrid
extends AbstractContentBlock

A structural element used by the NestedGridArrangement class to layout blocks in a grid structure.

See Also:
Serialized Form

          Creates a new empty grid.
